Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence and would make an outstanding addition to your collection. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To ensure both parties benefit, I propose a special introductory offer of $125 for this product. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
